misc

Class Util

  • java.lang.Object
    • misc.Util

  • public class Util
extends java.lang.Object
    Static utility class for a lot of things related to the Games. Stores many contants related to the screen size to help with scaling throughout the game. Also contains methods for computing collisions, and loadingImages
    Author:
    abraham
